lessons.title: Forces and Free-Body Diagrams
lessons.overview: Learn how to represent forces acting on an object using a free-body diagram (FBD).

blocks.heading: Concept overview
blocks.body: A free-body diagram isolates an object and shows all external forces: gravity, normal force, friction, tension.

blocks.heading: Worked example
blocks.body: A box on a flat floor: weight down, normal up. If pulled right, tension right and friction left.

question.text: On a box sitting still on a table, which force balances the weight?

games.title: Force Match
games.description: Choose the correct set of forces for different scenarios.
